sn22.153:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.3: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn22.153:1.5: “rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.6: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’ti.
sn22.153:1.10: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa, evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.11: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’ti.
sn22.153:1.15: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.153:1.17: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.18: ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, nabhavissa, na me bhavissati’”ti?
sn22.153:1.25: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
